title: API Academy: House Ceremony
description: You've made it to the House Ceremony. Choose your house by delivering your pledge scroll to the House Fire!
questDescription: Deliver your pledge scroll to the House Fire in the Main Hall to choose your house.

flavorTextOverrides.noHouse: I have to choose my house before I can explore the house areas.
flavorTextOverrides.wrongHouse: Lovelace Tower is the first house in the House Gauntlet. I should find the House Lovelace corridor!
